title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4100.3 - Time and place of meetings of commission
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4100.3 - Time and place of meetings of commission

State Regulations

Public notice of the time and place of any meeting of the
commission will be given to the news media at least one week before such
meeting and any interested person may attend such meeting. Informal meetings of
commissioners shall not be regarded within the purposes of this section as a
meeting of the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4100.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
